name: PRISONN
description:
PRISONN [Brackeys jam 2020.2]

One day you wake up and find yourself in total solitary,

After finding your way to escape your cell, You see a high-tech device which can look through the memory of the dead and with that device help you managed to find your way out in order to unlock the secret of your solitaire.

[P.S]

I know it's short (3 - 5 min) game, but i couldn't add more content on time but surely will if you guys find it interesting and show me your support! :)
